name: Bet on horses race
description:
This is a simple game written in C#. The basic idea is that two players are initially provided with 50 bucks credit, which they will spend on betting. There are four horses each player can bet on. You can bet 5 to 30 bucks on a horse, if you hit the target the amount bet will double, elsewhere you lose it. 

Hope you enjoy it!
